text: Its ancient bark seems to faintly glow with an inner light.
Barely visible runes, almost worn away by time, are carved into its trunk.
A palpable aura of stillness and age emanates from it.
The air around it feels unusually warm and calm.
Small, bioluminescent fungi cling to its roots, casting an ethereal glow at dusk.
notes: More likely if setting is dark/forest

text: Legend says it whispers secrets to those who listen closely on a full moon.
Its roots delve deep into the earth, perhaps tapping into some forgotten magic.
